content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my München apartment, let me start with a higher figure than what you may expect - say 1350 Euros per month. I believe this exceptional location, size, and amenities warrant such a premium price. If this number doesn't work for you, feel free to propose a lower figure, but remember our goal is to achieve the maximum possible rental income.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my budget is considerably lower than the suggested 1350 Euros due to my financial situation.
name: Max Müller from Germany
